title: Does anyone feel there's too much sustain nowadays?
body:
I can't really point my finger at the why (warlord's bloodlust aside), but recently when I've been playing I feel like my enemies can just heal up so quickly. It's no longer a game of attrition in lane, but rather a 'burst' or 'farm' situation.

Am I just making this up? Or does anyone feel the same..?

replies.body: There are a lot more regen masteries then def ones now.

I completely 100% agree with you. I was playing bot lane and at like level 4 or so, the enemy kog'maw(who had no lifesteal/crit items, did have 10% crit in runes) would heal back to full within ~ 9 seconds of me bringing him to about 10% hp. No sustain support, and happened everytime.
